content:
Hello, I was going to try out the FHIR mapping language and downloaded the current version of the FHIR Toolkit (v 0.0.56) from here: http://www.healthintersections.com.au/FhirServer/ When trying to run the "Transformer" application, I get a series of error windows:

The specified path was not found

(001257E0){FHIRTransformer.exe} [005267E0] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $B80A4
(00125672){FHIRTransformer.exe} [00526672] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $B7F36
(00261FCF){FHIRTransformer.exe} [00662FCF] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1F4893
(000CEBB0){FHIRTransformer.exe} [004CFBB0] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $61474

Upon clicking Ok:

Access violation at address 005C6A38 in module 'FHIRTransformer.exe'. Read of address 00000300

(001C5A38){FHIRTransformer.exe} [005C6A38] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1582FC
(014C3E92){FHIRTransformer.exe} [018C4E92] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1456756
(014C4065){FHIRTransformer.exe} [018C5065] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1456929
(0000989B){FHIRTransformer.exe} [0040A89B]
(00261FCF){FHIRTransformer.exe} [00662FCF] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1F4893
(000CEBB0){FHIRTransformer.exe} [004CFBB0] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $61474
(0002F9B4){FHIRTransformer.exe} [004309B4] Unknown function at __dbk_fcall_wrapper + $1DF8C
(00030680){FHIRTransformer.exe} [00431680] Unknown function at __dbk_fcall_wrapper + $1EC58
(014C404C){FHIRTransformer.exe} [018C504C] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1456910
(0002AC49){FHIRTransformer.exe} [0042BC49] Unknown function at __dbk_fcall_wrapper + $19221
(0002AC49){FHIRTransformer.exe} [0042BC49] Unknown function at __dbk_fcall_wrapper + $19221
(0000871C){FHIRTransformer.exe} [0040971C]
(0026306A){FHIRTransformer.exe} [0066406A] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1F592E
(00257901){FHIRTransformer.exe} [00658901] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1EA1C5
(002578B3){FHIRTransformer.exe} [006588B3] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1EA177
(00262D6E){FHIRTransformer.exe} [00663D6E] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $1F5632
(015137EC){FHIRTransformer.exe} [019147EC] Unknown function at TMethodImplementationIntercept + $14A60B0

After clicking OK on this error, I get a windows application error about an EInvalidPointer exception in the FHIRTransformer.exe and the application terminates.

I'm using Windows 10 64-bit.

Does anyone know how to get the Transformer GUI running? Thanks!
well, the stack dump is not useful there :-(
are yo uable to share me your workspace?
